TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TemplateContainerAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TemplateContainerAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TemplateContainerAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 屬性 (Property) 傳回 介面並使用 屬性 (Attribute) 標記，宣告其容器控制項的基底型別。

span.span: Declares the base type of the container control of a property that returns an interface and is marked with the attribute.

summary.span: 具有 屬性的控制項必須實作 介面。

span.span: The control with the property must implement the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件，當做參數傳入剖析器會使用物件的型別為用在資料繫結運算式的物件。The object that is passed in as a parameter of the object is used by the parser as the type of object that is used in data-binding expressions. 控制項的屬性會傳回介面，並會標示，必須實作介面。The control whose property returns an interface and is marked with the , must implement the interface. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立名為的樣板化控制項`TemplatedFirstControl`和其關聯容器，名為`FirstTemplateContainer`。The following code example demonstrates how to create a templated control named `TemplatedFirstControl` and associate it with a container named `FirstTemplateContainer`. 當指定的範本時，這可讓建立顯示當未指定範本的伺服器時間的自訂控制項和樣板的內容。This allows the creation of custom controls that display the server time when the template is not specified and the template's content when the template is specified. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/CS/templatecontainerattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/VB/templatecontainerattribute.vb#1)] 下列 Web 表單示範如何使用在先前的程式碼範例中所建立的自訂控制項。The following Web form demonstrates how to use the custom control created in the preceding code example. 兩個執行個體`TemplatedFirstControl`放置在網頁上：Two instances of the `TemplatedFirstControl` are placed on the page: - 第一個執行個體包含範本``。The first instance includes the template ``. - 第二個執行個體不包含``; 因此，它會顯示剛才的時間。The second instance does not include ``; therefore, it shows just the time. [!code-aspx-csharp[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/CS/templatecontainerattribute.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/VB/templatecontainerattribute.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 使用指定的容器型別，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified container type.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立名為的樣板化控制項`TemplatedFirstControl`和其關聯容器，名為`FirstTemplateContainer`。The following code example shows how to create a templated control named `TemplatedFirstControl` and associate it with a container named `FirstTemplateContainer`. 當指定的範本時，這可讓建立顯示當未指定範本的伺服器時間的自訂控制項和樣板的內容。This allows the creation of custom controls that display the server time when the template is not specified and the template's content when the template is specified. 類別會用於`FirstTemplate`屬性。The class is used for the `FirstTemplate` property. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/CS/templatecontainerattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/VB/templatecontainerattribute.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得容器控制項的繫結方向。

span.span: Gets the binding direction of the container control.

value.span: ，表示容器控制項的繫結方向。

span.span: A indicating the container control's binding direction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以是欄位中，範本可以接受只有屬性值的位置或 欄位中，範本可以在其中接受並公開 （expose） 屬性值。The property can be either the field, where the template can accept only property values or the field, where the template can accept and expose property values. 在第二個案例中，資料繫結控制項自動可以使用 update、 delete 和 insert 作業的資料來源使用`Bind`資料繫結語法。In the latter scenario, data-bound controls automatically can use the update, delete, and insert operations of a data source using the `Bind` data-binding syntax. 如需有關資料繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 繫結至資料庫](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)並[資料繫結運算式概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information on data binding, see [Binding to Databases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742) and [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立名為的樣板化控制項`TemplatedFirstControl`和其關聯容器，名為`FirstTemplateContainer`。The following code example demonstrates how to create a templated control named `TemplatedFirstControl` and associate it with a container named `FirstTemplateContainer`. 這可讓自訂控制項來顯示當未指定範本的伺服器時間建立和範本的內容時指定的範本。This allows the creation of custom controls that display the server time when the template is not specified and the contents of the template when the template is specified. 方法會判斷屬性`FirstTemplate`屬性`TemplateFirstControl`。The method determines the property of the `FirstTemplate` property of the `TemplateFirstControl`. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/CS/templatecontainerattribute.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/VB/templatecontainerattribute.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立名為的樣板化控制項`TemplatedFirstControl`和其關聯容器，名為`FirstTemplateContainer`。The following code example demonstrates how to create a templated control named `TemplatedFirstControl` and associate it with a container named `FirstTemplateContainer`. 當指定的範本時，這可讓建立顯示當未指定範本的伺服器時間的自訂控制項和樣板的內容。This allows the creation of custom controls that display the server time when the template is not specified and the template's content when the template is specified. 類別會用於`FirstTemplate`屬性以及指定屬性設為`FirstTemplateContainer`。The class is used for the `FirstTemplate` property and for specifying the property as `FirstTemplateContainer`.
